author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Ajman Committee meets to discuss preparations for 44th UAE National DayTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Ajman Committee meets to discuss preparations for 44th UAE National Day Published on : Monday, September 21, 2015
The Ajman Committee for the 44th UAE National Day celebrations held its first meeting to discuss the preparations for the 44th UAE National Day celebrations.
HE Faisal Al Nuaimi, General Manager of Ajman Tourism Development Department (ATDD) presided over the first meeting attended by representatives of all Ajman departments and business sector. The meeting began by the committee paying tribute to the martyrs of the homeland and then discussed the proposed strategies, events, activities including the timetable for all events that are planned across the emirate for this year’s
celebration.
The “Spirit of the Union” and honoring the martyrs and their families are the two main themes of the celebrations of the 44 National Day aimed at instilling the spirit of the union and the patriotism and sacrifice made by the martyrs in the public mind.
Some of the activities that are planned include the November 3rd march to celebrate Flag Day, 10th November to honor the mother of UAE Her Highness Sheikha Fatima bint Mubarak and events on 30th November as declared Martyrs Day which will signal the celebrations for the 44th UAE National Day. The activities will take place in different areas in Ajman such as in Manama and Masfoot, in addition to the activities in the Ajman
Museum and Flag Park.
Al Nuaimi also stressed the need for all government departments and institutions to work together to provide world-class festivities in order to attract more visitors to Ajman during the national day celebration. He also encouraged the participants to inform the department of the activities that they are planning to carry out and ensure that schedule of the activities is properly conveyed to the public so it would be easier for them to visit
and attend the celebrations in Ajman.
